enWisdom: A truthful friend is one of the blessings [of Allah]

Wisdom: إِخْوَانُ الصِّدْقِ زِينَةٌ فِي السَّرَّاءِ وَعُدَّةٌ فِي الضَّرَّاءِ
enWisdom: The amity between those who are brothers for the sake of Allah endures because of its firm foundation

Wisdom: مَنْ طَلَبَ صَدِيقَ صِدْقٍ وَفِيّاً طَلَبَ مَا لَا يُوجَدُ
enWisdom: One who does not overlook the mistakes of his friend will die lonely
A Friend is one whose friendship is true [even] in absence

Wisdom: الصَّدِيقُ الصَّدُوقُ مَنْ نَصَحَكَ فِي عَيْبِكَ وَحَفِظَكَ فِي غَيْبِكَ وَآثَرَكَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: A friend is a person who is ‘you’ except that he is other than you

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا سُمِّيَ الرَّفِيقُ رَفِيقاً لِأَنَّهُ يَرْفَقُكَ عَلَى صَلَاحِ دِينِكَ فَمَنْ أَعَانَكَ عَلَى صَلَاحِ دِينِكَ فَهُوَ الرَّفِيقُ الشَّفِيقُ
enWisdom: The comrade has been named raf?q because he encourages you to improve your religion; so whoever assists you to improve your faith, then he is a concerned comrade

Wisdom: عِنْدَ نُزُولِ الشَّدَائِدِ يُجَرَّبُ حِفَاظُ الْإِخْوَانِ
enWisdom: It is in times of tribulation that the protection of brethren is put to test

Wisdom: فِي الضِّيقِ يَتَبَيَّنُ حُسْنُ مُوَاسَاةِ الرَّفِيقِ
enWisdom: In times of difficulty one comes to know who his [true] friend is
In every companionship there is choice

Wisdom: فِي الضِّيقِ وَالشِّدَّةِ يَظْهَرُ حُسْنُ الْمَوَدَّةِ
enWisdom: In times of hardship and adversity, the value of [one’s] friendship becomes apparent

Wisdom: عِنْدَ زَوَالِ الْقُدْرَةِ يَتَبَيَّنُ الصَّدِيقُ مِنَ الْعَدُوِّ
enWisdom: It is in times of tribulation that the protection of brethren is put to test

Wisdom: مَنْ أَمَرَكَ بِإِصْلَاحِ نَفْسِكَ فَهُوَ أَحَقُّ مَنْ تُطِيعُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever commands you to reform yourself is most deserving of your obedience

Wisdom: مَنْ دَعَاكَ إِلَى الدَّارِ الْبَاقِيَةِ وَأَعَانَكَ عَلَى الْعَمَلِ لَهَا فَهُوَ الصَّدِيقُ الشَّفِيقُ
enWisdom: The noblest of traits is guarding one’s friendship and the best of endeavours is fulfilling one’s promise

Wisdom: مَنْ آثَرَكَ بِنَشَبِهِ فَقَدِ اخْتَارَكَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: One who prefers you to his property and wealth has preferred you over himself

Wisdom: لَا يَحُولُ الصَّدِيقُ الصَّدُوقُ عَنِ الْمَوَدَّةِ وَإِنْ جُفِيَ
enWisdom: The true friend will not turn away from his friendship even if he is treated harshly

Wisdom: لَا يَنْتَقِلُ الْوَدُودُ الْوَفِيُّ عَنْ حِفَاظِهِ وَإِنْ أُقْصِيَ
enWisdom: The loyal friend does not turn away from his friendship even if he is far away
